column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Bolin says : " Opal , wait !
#Text=" Bolin says : " I know , I know .

#Text=I did n't listen to you , and I sided with Kuvira , and I helped her take over the Earth Kingdom , and topple your home , and get your mom captured , and your brothers , and your dad ... Wow , that does sound really bad when I say it out loud like that .
#Text=But I 'm gon na make it up to you .
#Text=" Lin says : " Pardon me , lovebirds , but I need a word with Opal .
#Text=Privately .
#Text=I 'm sorry , kid , but Raiko could n't convince the other leaders to attack Kuvira .
#Text=" Opal says : " So our family ... " Lin says : " Looks like we 're going to have to save them ourselves .
#Text=" Opal says : " Do n't you think some other people would agree to go with us ?
#Text=" Lin says : " This is an unsanctioned and dangerous mission into enemy territory .
#Text=We ca n't ask other people to risk their necks for our family .
#Text=If we want to break them out , we 'll have to do it alone .
#Text=" Mako says : " Bolin , I 'm so glad you 're back .
#Text=I was worried about you .
#Text=" Korra says : " We all were .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Thanks , guys .
#Text=Mako , I 'm so sorry about the way we left things .
#Text=I 'm such an idiot .
#Text=You tried to warn me about Kuvira and I ran off anyway , like an idiot .
#Text=You were right and I 'm just an idiot .
#Text=I hope ... that ... I 'll be able to earn your trust again .
#Text=" Korra says : " If anyone has lost people 's trust , it 's me .
#Text=Ever since Kuvira kicked my butt , no one even wants me around .
#Text=" Mako says : " We want you around .
#Text=And Bolin , you 're not an idiot .
#Text=You were just doing what you thought was right .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Aww , I love you guys .
#Text=And I really wan na hug again .
#Text="
